structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.text:
If any party redeems any parcel of real estate from the lien of any tax bill, the party shall, in addition to all other amounts then due, including principal, interest, and costs, also pay costs to the collector as follows:
One dollar ($1) per parcel of real estate for issuance of certificate of redemption;
Five dollars ($5) per parcel of real estate, if notice of publication has been commenced; and
Five dollars ($5) as an additional charge for parcel of real estate if notice of the commissioner's sale has been commenced.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 314, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1980.
